titles.title: A resolution commending the University of Michigan softball team for winning the National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Championship on June 8, 2005.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/16/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Commends the University of Michigan softball team for winning the 2005 National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I Championship. Recognizes all of the players and coaches who were instrumental in this achievement.
